name: DPTeam
tagline: Web Development for Startups, SaaS and Business
description:
We work with startups, SaaS, CRM, business apps.
We use JavaScript, AngularJs (Angular2), Ruby on Rails (RoR).
100% Client Satisfaction | 100% Client Dedication | 100% Privacy
There are a number of excellent front-end and some backend developers with 4-10 years experience in our team for your choice. Clear code, good communication, and timeliness are our better sides. We are used to working using Agile methodology and this allows us to ensure the high quality and timely task completion. Our team's experience was gained in the complex projects. Our customers are start-ups, as well as the large networks with a staff of several thousand people in them.
